author: cnbc.com
title: Owens Realty reports 4Q loss
text:
WALNUT CREEK, Calif. (AP) _ Owens Realty Mortgage Inc. (ORM) on Tuesday reported a loss of $4.4 million in its fourth quarter.
On a per-share basis, the Walnut Creek, California-based company said it had a loss of 44 cents.
The real estate investment trust posted revenue of $3.9 million in the period.
For the year, the company reported profit of $8.7 million, or 85 cents per share. Revenue was reported as $15.5 million.
Owens Realty shares have decreased 12 percent since the beginning of the year.
